title: Link Checker is not installed
name: Drupal-7:acquiaLinkCheckerDisabled
description: The Link Checker module can sometime cause timeouts when cron is run.
remediation: Disable the Link Checker module: `drush pm-uninstall linkchecker -y`.
success: The Link Checker module is not currently enabled.
failure: The Link Checker module is currently enabled.

module.description: The name of the module to ensure is not installed.
